tasks.description: Error Handling Framework - Implement ErrorClass with structured error types and metadata tracking

Persistence & Offline - Implement SessionPersistence layer with auto-recovery

Persistence & Offline - Implement CacheManager with storage backends (IndexedDB, localStorage)

Persistence & Offline - Persistence testing and offline functionality verification
Testing Framework - Implement comprehensive unit tests for all core modules

Final Integration - Complete integration testing and acceptance verification for Phase 4

summary: Phase 4 implementation: 6-week sprint (30 developer-days) with 5 comprehensive implementation guides covering error handling, auth isolation, persistence, testing, monitoring, and deployment
